game_beginning: ^I still find it hard to accept that father is no longer with us.
^You probably don’t remember this place very well.
^You used to hate it when you were a child.
^Why didn't granpa leave this place to you?

c-0: ^Because he needed to care for HER son.

c-1: ^Yes, I'm sorry. I mean your mom.

c-0: ^Why are you just standing there? Take a look around!
^If you have any questions, you can find me here.

show_evidence: ^Huh? Do you want to show me something?

c-0: ^I'll stay here if you need me.
^I've made a huge mistake when I was younger, Oscar.
^I don't think you should read too much into it.

bottle_collected: ^I don't think they meant granpa, Sara

c-0: ^Yes. And don't look at me like that, I have nothing to tell you.

photograph_collected: ^This is the last time that I saw her this happy.
folder_collected: ^...I can't believe he didn't get rid of that!
^Why is the date listed a year BEFORE mom's death?

c-0: ^A typo. Dad was bad with dates, haha.

drawing_collected: ^Oh, it's... um... a picture you drew!

c-0: ^Were you guys fighting? Why are you holding my hand?
^Oscar, I don't remember. It was more than 20 years ago!

mug_collected: ^Huh? Why are you showing me a mug?
^Oscar don't waste my time with this rubbish!
vase_collected: ^Um... Yeah, I see that's a vase.
stapler_collected: ^Oh, I don't need a stapler, thank you.

c-0: ^Your dad left Nina right after she gave birth to you.
^Nina met a shady guy. He was a drug dealer.
^And then I found out. I was horrified.
^I told dad everything and took you away.
^Nina and I had a fight. She asked me why I was doing it to her.
^I told her I couldn't trust a junkie.
^She relapsed and got in the driver's seat. You know the rest.
^I'm sorry Oscar. You must be angry at me but all I wanted was you to be safe.

player_lost: ^Stop. I don't know why you don't trust me.
^You're just wasting my time by bringing me this junk.
^Is that a prank? I lost my dad, Oscar.
^I can't do it anymore. I'm going back to work.
